bibl.title: The Cologne Sappho. Its Discovery and Textual Constitution.
The New Sappho on Old Age. Textual and Philosophical Issues
bibl.author: HAMMERSTAEDT, Jürgen

bibl.note: Discovery and Acquisition. - First Edition, Partial Overlap with P. Oxy. XV, 1787, fr. 1 (= M.-P.3 1449; LDAB 3899). - The Third Cologne Fragment with More Sappho and an Anonymous Lyric Poem. - The Hands and Their Probable Date. - The Division of the Two Poems by Sappho in the First Column of the Cologne Papyrus. - P. Oxy. XV, 1787, fr. 1 and 2: Papyrological and Textual Evidence Concerning Poem-Division. - Some Further Notes on the Text of the Cologne Papyrus [P. Colon. Inv. 21351 + 21376 (= M.-P.3 1449.01; LDAB 10253)].
